item.title: Convert Roman to Integer in Java
item.description: Problem: Given a Roman numeral, convert it to an Integer.

item.title: Convert Integer to Roman in Java
item.description: Problem: Given an Integer input, convert it to a Roman numeral. Input is within the range from 1 to 3999.
